backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing destinations, transport options, users, bookings, and contact inquiries with access control and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old booking records to include the new transportOptionId field and initializing new transport option state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, hooks, layout, and global styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions setting OKLCH color variables and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router setup and routes for all main pages wrapped in the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom options and exposes status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching destinations, transport options, inquiries, and creating bookings. Integrates backend actor calls with caching and error mapping.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global styling tokens for colors, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app by setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Imports global CSS and configures query client.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing DreamDestination's mission and features using cards and icons. Provides styled informational content about the service vision.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Implements the booking workflow with identity checks, form validation, prefilled data, and booking submission via hooks. Displays past bookings and handles transport option constraints.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and submission to backend inquiries. Shows contact information cards and handles success and error UI states.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationDetailsPag: Renders detailed info for a selected destination, including location, image, transport options, and booking navigation with auth checks and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of destinations with images, descriptions, and links to detail pages, including loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, marketing content, and links to explore destinations or contact the site.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Manages Internet Identity authentication with sign‑in, sign‑out, status feedback, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Holds the current project state, including schema version, summary, architectural notes, and a list of existing implemented features. Serves as the central metadata record for tracking versions and requirements of the DreamDestination app.
